
ApiDocPro Direct usage example:

```js
// Custom Theme can be clones from No theme example when needed
import * as THEME from '../theme/default/default';
<ApiDocPro
  title="Disable all regions with only middle region to show"
  spec={spec}
  leftregion={true}
  rightregion={true}
  collapse={false}
  theme={THEME}
//   header={false}
/>
```
